short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost your research with Canvas8.com! Bookmark web pages, documents, videos & snippets to scrapbook, find related trends & insights

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly save anything you find online with the Canvas8.com Scrapbook+ extension.  Bookmark entire websites, videos, or documents from any platform directly to your scrapbook.  Need inspiration?  Use the powerful search to uncover related consumer trends and insights on Canvas8.  Found the perfect quote or image?  The snippet tool lets you save just the part you need and connects you to related Canvas8 reads.  Boost your research and never lose track of your online discoveries.
